name: webcode-embed
description: A small web component for code demos with fallback in case of disabled JavaScript in browser.

scripts.build: npx esbuild webcode-embed.js --bundle --outfile=dist/webcode-embed.min.js --format=iife --minify && gzip -9 -c dist/webcode-embed.min.js > dist/webcode-embed.min.js.gz && brotli -9 -c dist/webcode-embed.min.js > dist/webcode-embed.min.js.br
